topic: The Imposter recognized by the whole country (False Dmitry I.)

A solitary catfolk figure (Lzhedmitry I) wearing opulent Muscovite Tsar robes stands in a vast, dimly lit throne room. He looks intensely forward, slightly haunted. Visible pixels, limited color palette, no text.

The Tsar catfolk breathes visibly, his tail sways slowly, and his head performs a slight, contained nod of deep contemplation (looping heroic movement). Limited palette, no text.
